## Source: ossf-package-analysis (abdaea1e9dd909d2aad2e0b7b2299011c37d3c8af5e0c14cf4cfb0213cad4edd)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@dpdgroupuk/design-space-components' @ 10.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
